statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the trapezoid above. Side lengths are measurements.
The bottom has length \displaystyle{13.07}; top has length \displaystyle{13.60}. The sides have lengths \displaystyle{9.62} and \displaystyle{9.72}. The height is \displaystyle{9.49}.

solution.p: The perimeter is the sum of the four sides which are given. \displaystyle{13.60}+{9.72}+{13.07}+{9.62}={46.01}.
